live_updates: Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter. A further update will be provided at 11:13 MT. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
59472.summary: Some customers in the Penbrooke Meadows area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
59472.title: Mar 27 - Calgary (Penbrooke Meadows) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
